Method Details

run(cmd, timeout=None)
Static Method

source code 

Run a shell command and return the output.

Parameters:
  • cmd - shell command with its arguments
  • cmd - tuple or str
  • timeout (float or None) - maximum duration in seconds
Returns: ShellInfo
Raises:
  • InvalidCommandError - on invalid executable
  • TimeoutError - when the timeout is expired

runstrict(cmd, timeout=None)
Static Method

source code 

Same as Shell.run(), but raises ProcessError on bad exit code.

Parameters:
  • cmd - shell command with its arguments
  • cmd - tuple or str
  • timeout (float or None) - maximum duration in seconds
Returns: ShellInfo
Raises:
  • ProcessError - on bad exit code
  • TimeoutError - when the timeout is expired
